joint_involvement.justification: Polyarthrite rhumatoïde mentions multiple large and small joints

serology.justification: RF: positive (87 UI/mL) -> High-positive RF, Anti-CCP: positive (67 U/mL) -> High-positive Anti-CCP/ACPA

treatment_context.justification: Presence of methotrexate and rituximab as DMARDs or bDMARDs strongly suggests established RA

classification_rationale: The total score is 9 (ACR/EULAR 2010), which meets the criteria for RA+. The treatment context also provides strong evidence of established RA.

rag_guidelines.query: serology RF rheumatoid factor thresholds serology anti-CCP ACPA thresholds acute phase CRP inflammation thresholds acute phase ESR VHS inflammation thresholds joint involvement polyarthritis small joints MCPs PIPs treatment DMARD methotrexate treatment biologic anti-TNF ACR EULAR classification criteria interpretation scoring

guideline_citation: Aletaha D, et al. Arthritis Rheum. 2010;62(9):2569-2581
